p: TiO 2 is an important technological material with widespread applications in solar cells and photocatalysis (Fujishima and Honda, 1972; Fujishima et al., 2008; Schneider et al., 2014; Stetsovych et al., 2015). Although rutile is the stable bulk phase, anatase nanoparticles are often found to be the most active components in these applications.
